tool_description: Processes screening interview results and provides standardized scoring of applicant responses, communication skills, and overall suitability for volunteer positions.

interview_id.description: Unique identifier for the completed interview

interviewer_notes.description: Detailed notes from the screening interview

applicant_responses.description: Key responses provided by the applicant during interview

evaluation_categories.description: Categories to evaluate (communication, motivation, availability, experience, culture_fit)

role_requirements.description: Key requirements for the volunteer role

error_messages: Invalid interview ID: Provide a valid interview identifier
Empty interviewer notes: Interview notes are required for evaluation
Insufficient responses: At least 3 applicant responses needed for evaluation
Invalid evaluation categories: Use valid categories like communication, motivation, availability, experience, culture_fit
Missing role requirements: Provide role requirements for fit assessment
usage: Submit completed interview notes and applicant responses along with evaluation criteria to receive standardized assessment of interview performance.

concerns.description: Areas of concern identified during interview
